locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Calling it a Petro is misleading. Has the same amount of truck spots as a ta or ta express. Doesn't have a iron skillet and only has 5 showers. The staff seems friendly and the place seems clean but all they have is a popeyes. There's some hotels in the area and an ihop.
Like every Petro location, place is clean, many parking spots available staff is friendly

We stopped here super early - 5:15 am. Clean outside, clean store inside and a very clean restroom! Both the men's room (and from Mrs. K., the ladies) were super clean. No papers on the counter, no water on the floor, clean smell. Fabulous. ‚Ä¶

This is By Far the nicest Petro we have ever stopped in for gas! The customer service is very kind and professional, the store is nice, neat and clean and the restrooms are very nice and clean. We are transporters and frequently stop at truck stops. This one is impressive- 5 stars deserved!!

This place is one of my favorite places to stop on the way from Florida. There's a huge selection of hand made candies, fudges, and last minute state gifts. The restrooms were clean. Most importantly the staff is always super polite. I love this place.

locations.showerReviewSummary: 5 shower-related reviews found. Generally Positive mentions of: shower, showers, clean, restroom
locations.address: ÓÉà1105 E King Ave, Kingsland, GA 31548, United States

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Wow this store is amazing. It's very inviting from the minute you enter. They have so much to offer. Fresh fruit and salads. Showers for the truckers. Hot fresh food ready to order. A little of everything from shirts and hats. Sunglasses ‚Ä¶

The staff is very friendly, the place is very clean, there are many private bathrooms, two microwaves, a lounge, a game room, a laundry room, the gas price is very cheap, and there is a discount for downloading software. Pilot üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶

GBY all Aman Be Safe Stay Saved.
Very large place many workers all around. I didn't get a chance to go into the restroom I had to get back on the road with my friends but it's a very large ‚Ä¶

Stop here last night and filled up this morning. I took a shower and the shower was clean. I got Subway and it was good and fresh. And then this morning I got some items off the breakfast bar. My only complaint about everything is powdered eggs
Holy moly what a great pilot it is. Its big, many fuel pumps and its super clean. Stopped here for a scale and a quick break. Awesome.

Nice stop off rt.95N
Very good organic coffee - choices of medium and dark roast, freshly brewed, also souvenirs, snacks, Wendy's food, gas, bathrooms
Everything is clean, people are nice.
This truck stop has so much to offer.. Plenty of food options and always seems to be clean.. Also plenty of parking

showerReviews.reviewText: Always the same thing here. You open the app to reserve a shower and says 0 minutes waiting time. Then once you reserve it. Put you on hold. Im waiting for 30 minutes and doesn‚Äôt have the code yet.

locations.showerReviewSummary: 1 shower-related reviews found. Mixed mentions of: shower

locations.title: Gas2Go # 3 (Atlantic Travel Center)
locations.content: Gas2Go # 3 (Atlantic Travel Center) may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Favorite truck stop no doubt, small shower, no private toilet, but really clean... food is GREAT, cant emphasize that enough, traditional cuban/dominican food... you have to stop here and eat period...
Nice and clean place with good Dominican food, also has a shower and most importantly it has low diesel price!!

locations.title: King Travel Plaza
locations.content: King Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a very clean and nice bathroom this place offers that. Very nice place to take a shower of you need it and not at all like a trashy truck stop. Great coffee and clean restrooms I'm a happy customer. It wasnt a very ‚Ä¶
Free parking.  great shower and toilet, Great cafe, but only works during the day.  Low fuel cost.  A few people.  Recommend!!!

‚Ä¶ , I wondered why there were few trucks there. Why: card didn't work at pump, the place is dirty and run down, shower had no hot water, getting in and out is complicated and may require a U turn.  Just go a few miles South on 95 and find ‚Ä¶
No hot water still charged me full price for a shower  and the towels they give u would dry a infant hahha the taco restaurant in side was great

Showers are never cleaned,used soap bars are left in shower,you have to bring it to their attention,Their idea of cleaning a shower is pickup dirty towels and put new ones in, no santatzing or mopping the floor..

showerReviews.reviewText: It was an ok experience,  1 shower and not much space to spread out items to wash, floor wasn't clean but a shower is better than none. Kinda limited parking older store, and getting in and out of this place cab be tight and busy at times.

Despite spending $1100 on Diesel this week alone at this very location they refused to honor a free shower because I didn't have a rewards card. Have come here dozens of times throughout the years and it's never been a problem, even with ‚Ä¶
Don't come shower here they don't have their shi together

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Clean shower, good water pressure.
Cashier (black lady) very helpful and polite.
On the other hand, subway was a mess I think it's because the young girl who made my sandwich still new, she charged wrong price.

Nice stop for gas and use restroom. Clean facilities. Working on adding gas pumps.
Had to go inside to get my receipt. ‚Ä¶

I'm not sure what happened here. Whoever is managing it now is not able to do it properly. The store seems to be in decline. It has a feeling like it will be called Ocean way quick mart in the next 5 years. It's not clean like it used to be and they always seem to be out of one or more things I stop for.
Very nice and well stocked convenience store. The bathrooms were clean and they offered a large amount of fuel stations for easy fill ups.

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower 15 is very small. Don‚Äôt touch the walls cause there seems to be crap smeared on the shower walls. Mold. No ventilation. No fan no where to hang towels  it‚Äôs broken. Toilet seat broken. üòû ‚Ä¶

I'm a driver and was in need of a shower. Stopped here and was the worst mistake ever. It looked like this room had never been cleaned or dusted. Mold, dust, and water stains everywhere. If this is what a clean shower room is supposed to ‚Ä¶
If you like molded shower heads & rust stains all around the shower come to flying j and enjoy a dirty filthy shower. ‚Ä¶
Clean restroom clean shower inside clean around coffee machine clean good truckstop

I love this Flying J, just before Jacksonville it's a good place to stop for breakfast and shower. Stayed for a 10 hour and got girlfriend food for the night drive. Manager told us about their deal of wings & pizza, even let girlfriend try ‚Ä¶

Couldn‚Äôt get a shower in the morning. Nobody seems to be assigned to prepare them.  No notice. No apology. Denny‚Äôs was acceptable and appreciated it being open.  Ok place to stop for the night then keep going‚Ä¶ Lacking and food at the truck ‚Ä¶
Shower smells like sea water or rotten eggs smells coming from the shower water the parking lot smells the same way too

They have 15 showers 1 person cleaning the shower plus they have to change the garbage outside been waiting over 30 mins and it only 2 people ahead of me on a Saturday not even crowded this is crazy over worked and I'm sure under paid.

It's fueling station... The shower rooms could use a refreshing (refurbishing).  It's not the fault of the workers, and I would not place blame upon the store owner, either.  Unfortunately, there are just some people that are longtime slobs ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to live on the road the Flying J give us a recognizable stopping point. I always get a discount on fuel and can rely on a clean hot shower when I need one. This location was bright clean and well maintained, All the things I expect when I ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Clean shower, good water pressure.
Cashier (black lady) very helpful and polite.
On the other hand, subway was a mess I think it's because the young girl who made my sandwich still new, she charged wrong price.

‚Ä¶ hard to get into. i had to get up on the curb in front of the parking and even then i still barely made it in. the shower was good, just the water pressure was lackluster. wouldn't mind coming back, just won't expect to find a spot easily.

‚Ä¶ reading this just about every Love's truck stop across the country that I've ever been to what's your done taking a shower they take your washcloths and towels they throw them on the floor and use their feet to drag them across the ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Love's also has showers for $12 dollars plus tax. Hubby and I have showered at this particular Love's a few times. There is no extra fee for two because you are using the same shower. ‚Ä¶

To preface I am tired, 3 days no shower, and been OTR now for 7 weeks.  The pump key pads on several pumps are shot, forces cardless Carriers to go inside so that sucks and why I can't 5 star it. However, on the inside they have an amazing ‚Ä¶

Drove 17 miles here to get a shower after the app told me there were showers available. Had to stand around and wait for about 10 minutes as the only attendant was not assisting me and finally had to force the attendant to acknowledge me, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ very courteous associates working. Almost clean restroom. Shelves, well stocked. In the morning 5am, I ordered a shower & it was immediately ready. When I entered, I could see why. Scraps of tp near the toilet. Paper under the sink. Trash ‚Ä¶
Manager Elizabeth was little to no help to a driver trying to get a shower she was just arguing don‚Äôt forget you have a job because of the drivers.

‚Ä¶ given it 5Stars, Desmond was exceptional. However, the alleged Manager (Caucasian female) was digging in her pants, while I was trying to tell her how helpful Desmond was, assisting me with shower. She also seemed like she wasn‚Äôt even ‚Ä¶

Stopped here to take a shower üöø after visiting the beach on our stay in Jacksonville and the showers were really clean. I wasn't expecting that. The good smells of the food was a bonus when walking into the store and they had really cute ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: We only fuel at TA‚Äôs for fuel and we went in to take a shower this morning and the guy at the counter stated the showers were down due to no one there to clean them. I asked if I could clean one and he told me no that he would get wrote up ‚Ä¶

Phenomenal showers! Hands down the best showers in all of America! Lora does an exceptional job ! She‚Äôs deserving of the best tip possible!! Can‚Äôt express how relaxing it was to shower in such a clean and phenomenal ambiance!! Add to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The restrooms are very nice and have always been clean every time I‚Äôve used them. Well this past week I decided to take my break here and go in for a shower. I didn‚Äôt pay for this shower as I had ultra one fuel credits that I used instead. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The shower was decent and there is a Starbucks at this location which is amazing to come across for truck drivers so thank you for that.

Stopped for food and a shower and let‚Äôs just say should of went elsewhere. Subway has no hot food. Was told the toaster oven has been broken for 2 months. This is very unacceptable to me as a driver that plans my stops for the food they ‚Ä¶

I see lots of money dumped in this place for remodel, not for drivers but car travlers.  Todays shower, the entire room the floor was like standing in ice.  I had to find my way to the back from the front.  As long as their is a Starbucks ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ my first impression last night was 5 star it was so clean in the bathroom.  This morning I went into shower and the guy working was useless and rude. Several people were waiting to shower but the key pad weren't working he not dealing with ‚Ä¶
Some kind of worms or something living in the shower walls of shower #5
Hands down the CLEANEST Ta/Petro showers I have ever used. After a long and stressful day, it feels so amazing to come to a clean shower. Very impressed and grateful!
Clean but no air conditioning for truck drivers when taking a shower, has been broken for 8months and still charged  $16 for a miserable shower

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stop here last night and filled up this morning. I took a shower and the shower was clean. I got Subway and it was good and fresh. And then this morning I got some items off the breakfast bar. My only complaint about everything is powdered ‚Ä¶
Worst shower ever mold growing all over nasty I did let the person upfront about the shower #9 but she just brushed it off pilot needs to do better

Tonight,  we stopped and shut down here. Went to take showers,  and holy frickin cow!! The floor was DRENCHED.  The shower floor was so slick that I was afraid I'd fall if I moved too fast. There was a used washcloth in the shower,  hair ‚Ä¶
Be aware truckers,  you might have to clean the toilets that's in the shower room. I had to grab cleaning supplies off of their unattended cleaning cart

Stopped here to do laundry in the afternoon.  Lots of parking very big parking lot. Took shower good showers. Did laundry good washers & dryers. And they even have this cute voluptuous thick light skin lady up in there long black hair named ‚Ä¶

Shower would be how I set it then pulse really hot. Towel rack came off on one side. Food is good tho. Was a nice change from subway n fast food all the time. Clean place, friendly staff when I was there.

This is the best Pilot on the entire 95 corridor. always clean no matter what time of day it is. the shower's are clean great pressure. the staff here really make the difference. always working cleaning. and you always get a welcome to ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The shower was good also. ‚Ä¶

They desperately in need of cosmetic repairs.  I felt so uncomfortable in the shower room.  Tacky shower curtain KITCHEN chair for sitting and floors half clean as well as the shower and sink.  Now days I travel with my own lysol and wipes. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ! Prolly close to a quarter mile of parking. This will be added to my favorites list of truckstops around the country as I pretty much know I can count on getting a free parking space close to shower and food any time of the day or night.
